data.expected_result: The text in the buttons don't get cut off.
data.short_description: When you set your font to the largest size and open a modal with with too much text (like the password manager modal), and switch orientation, the text in the buttons get cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set the text to the largest size. - Logout. - Click on Login. - Click on "Use a password manager?". - Switch orientation.
